headline.main: BRITISH URGED TO 'WIN' GERMANS AFTER WAR; ' Treat Them Rough' Advocates Hear Plea for Re-education

lead_paragraph: LONDON, April 1 -- Adherents of the "treat them rough" school, who demand the destruction of the German State, listened at luncheon yesterday to the arguments of an exponent of the opposing view that the way to lasting peace in Europe is to "win them over."
abstract: W G Brown urges winning Germans over after war
